description:
When waiting to checkout at the supermarket or when waiting for a walk signal, Mom suddenly notices that Bunji is dancing.  One day, the other boys come over to do homework, and next thing she knows, everyone is dancing.  What is going on?; The other moms have gathered at Mom`s house late at night again.  The "Snack Moms" is in full swing. Today`s discussion topic is a showdown over cutting corners when making lunch, the "Veteran Lunch Makers Competition."; In a rare instance, Bunji is enthusiastically studying at home. Mom peeks and sees him studying a subject newly introduced into compulsory education, International Studies, an English class.  Mom is a little impressed when the 3 spirits appear before her;It`s evening and Fumi is alone, swinging on the swing at the park. She had a fight with Mom and ran out of the house. A kindly girl with a shopping bag happens upon her...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dance Family / Veteran Lunch Box Makers / Let`s Discuss! / Runaway Girl Fumi
舞族 / 弁当選手権 / レッツ, ディスカッション! / 家出少女ふみ
